website_summaries.verdict: Contemporary wallpaper that is both beautiful and well-made. Its looks, durability, and features make it the best by far.
pros: An impressive list of qualities earn it our top spot
Antimicrobial protection, extra-thick construction, modern textured design
cons: The color may look slightly different once applied

customer_reviews.title: Not Your Grandma's Wallpaper!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, modern wallpaper to add class to any room! The item looks just like the picture but the feel is unexpectedly amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Mhudson004

customer_reviews.title: Best wall paper ever !!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I trusted the reviews on this product. I was a little scare to do wall paper on one of my walls. We didn’t know how to do it or how the results would turn out. So we pretty much trusted the reviews and went for it. Boy oh boy do we love it. It’s stunning ! It gave my house an entire different look. Very elegant. I’m very happy with the results. My husband did his homework and the results were great !
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Oropeza

customer_reviews.title: Color Caution
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wallpaper but has more tan/taupe undertones than gray. Wanted to use in gray/white master bath but decided against it due to color scheme. If you're looking for clean gray & white, I don't recommend this product. Thick lines that trim the ovals are tan, not white.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsie

customer_reviews.title: High quality wallpaper and easy to work with, plus great rich color and contrast
customer_reviews.text: We wallpapered two walls of our hall bath as an accent and it turned out beautiful This wallpaper is very high quality with a raised pattern that begs to be touched We have not wallpapered anything in over 30 years and were concerned if we could do it ourselves with all the cutouts around the countertops and cabinets, but we did it and it is stunning
customer_reviews.author: Dagwood

customer_reviews.title: Great wallpaper.
customer_reviews.text: Great wallpaper.. easy to work with and almost no pieces wasted.. on real it’s even better For 250 Sq2 wall, I needed 4.5 rolls and 2 glue buckets.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: High quality wallpaper
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality wallpaper. Very modern design, easy to work with even for a novice. We used it on the focal wall in the master bedroom. It adds elegance and warmth to the room. It took us 4 hours from start to finish with the wall you see on the picture (10 strips of wallpaper). We are very detailed people, so it took time to measure, cut and hang each piece. We quickly learned to apply adhesive generously. The paper did not rip once. I ordered 4 rolls to be safe, ended up needing 3. Highly recommend this wallpaper.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This wallpaper is absolutely beautiful. Its thick, has a unique texture, and the color is absolutely what I expected and wanted. I highly recommend this wallpaper to anyone. The company, Blooming Walls, proved to be a very customer friendly and went far beyond the call of duty. My husband bought me a roll of this last year, which was from Lot 118. I bought two more roles to finish the wall, which arrived from Lot 120. The older lot and the newer lot don't align perfectly (which is a standard problem with all wall paper). Blooming Wall replaced my older roll of paper without extra cost. It was extremely generous of them.
customer_reviews.author: CeD

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, thick, textured.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wallpaper. Think, excellent quality, love the color and textures. This was my first time hanging wallpaper, it's not rocket science, but it isn't fun. Make sure to account for waste because you'll have to line up the pattern. I used almost one roll for my project (we pic). You have to buy glue for this paper, and I found it best to apply the glue to the back of the wallpaper, rather than the wall. Make sure to get all the edges coated in glue, those spots will be the first you notice pulling off the wall if you don't glue them well. Overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin H. Soto

customer_reviews.title: product is very nice, it has more than just grey if you ...
customer_reviews.text: product is very nice, it has more than just grey if you look closely. the only drawback is the patterns overlap onto the text strip so you end up waisting 4" per strip in order to line up the patterns.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Won’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to put on, I wasn’t happy with the product at all. The design on the wallpaper were cut equally, some had design cut out and some didn’t. I didn’t ended up removing the wallpaper because the design wasn’t consistent. This is not easy installed, I won’t recommend this. I emailed the customer service and they never got to me. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Alishan

customer_reviews.title: Soo Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s absolutely gorgeous!!! Exactly what I wanted!! The texture is perfect. Easy to put up. Did 1 wall for my accent wall. Ordered 3 rolls to be safe, I think I would have been ok with 2. But it’s fine... saving the rest just Incase I feel like using it elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: BiZMa2009

customer_reviews.title: Looks great after I finally installed it (first time wallpapering)
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the glue from amazon as well and something to spread the glue. Have lots of space when applying and something to catch, wipe the glue that may drip out. Clean rags are best. It sat for 5 months before I installed it. It's a one wall application, so an entire room would need 3-4 of these. I used it for one wall and it looked great. I highly recommend this for anyone who wants an artistic wall. What you need: wallpaper glue, rags(non microfibre and not paper towels), paint catching sheets (all available from a dollar store)
customer_reviews.author: Harv G

customer_reviews.title: Good quality paper.
customer_reviews.text: I used the paper to line the backs of bookcases that were brown and created a dark, recessed look. I wanted to brighten up the area and this paper worked beautifully. Followed instructions and used a thick wallpaper paste. Rather than putting paste onto the back of the paper I put it on the bookshelf and placed the paper on top. I used a sqweegie to press it down
customer_reviews.author: FrancescaTexas

customer_reviews.title: Sent 2 different patterns
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 rolls of the same wall paper but was sent 2 different Types of patterns could not notice from the packaging but once installed by the workers it’s terribly noticeable! Nice paper but gonna cost me more to get job redone! Waiting to hear back from seller emails sent
customer_reviews.author: Carlyn

customer_reviews.title: The most beautiful wallpaper i have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: I have not yet put it on the wall yet but it is so beautiful, i cant stop looking at it. I know it'll turn out gorgeous
customer_reviews.author: NiLo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, quality paper.
customer_reviews.text: Tackled this bathroom project myself. First time installing wallpaper and it went very well. I am glad that the paper was thick and sturdy for moving into place. Looks very high quality when up and the seams are barely noticeable. I purchased the recommended paste to install.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer#1

customer_reviews.title: Very Elegant!
customer_reviews.text: Very Elegant, added lots of style to the rooms. Although I will mention the swirly lines are not white, they are more yellowish in color. Would have been nice if they were white. Other than that it still looks great! I hope these pictures help you decide. I feel it can go both ways; modern or traditional style. Our house is very modern. Good Luck.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, great quality
customer_reviews.text: we used it in the master room, change completely the atmosphere of the room.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Triana

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant and modern
customer_reviews.text: Super elegant wallpaper! It was installed in my dental office and everyone likes it
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: It’s a JOB
customer_reviews.text: The wallpaper was pretty decent. Looks good on the wall but man it’s a pain putting it over flat paint. Had to glue the paper and the wall but it turned out pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, thick paper with nice texture - careful not to over rub trying to remove excess glue as it has a delicate finish.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Kern

customer_reviews.title: Changing star rating on this wall paper.  I ordered an additional “ double
customer_reviews.text: Love my new entry way. Paper went up well. difficult to find the match so not for novice paper hangers. Figure for quite a bit of waste with the 18" drop match and this paper will not be strippable without some effort.
customer_reviews.author: Joee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent material
customer_reviews.text: Excellent material is really easy to work with. It looks beautiful exactly like it’s on the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Almonte

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY IS SUPERB
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the paper is incredibly good.. very thick and doesn’t easily tear.. just one thing.. Those wavy lines aren’t white but more like light yellow.. so careful if your other walls in that room are white.. would look like a mismatch..
customer_reviews.author: PGT

customer_reviews.title: This wallpaper is absolutely gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: The feel of it is textured and it feels great and looks great. I put this up in my bathroom and I have gotten SO MANY compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: The rolls are almost double
customer_reviews.text: This wallpaper is absolutely stunning! Very classy ! Wish it had a brighter metallic silver finish in it, but you still can see the metallic on it!! You would not be disappointed. Everyone that comes to my home is impressed by it, and many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: AmazSebastian Acosta on Customer

customer_reviews.title: This wall paper is such a great quality and looks great installed
customer_reviews.text: This wall paper is such a great quality and looks great installed. The only problem I ran into was matching the patterns up. I wasn't able to match it up perfectly but unless you are looking for imperfections it's not that noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Martin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and fancy wall paper, worked perfectly for my bedroom wall
customer_reviews.author: laila

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service! Easy to apply! Make sure to order enough! Used almost 3 rolls for this small room! Thank you 😀
customer_reviews.author: sabawoon shewa

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Good customer service. They replied right away to the email and replace the defective roll with no additional charge.
customer_reviews.author: Mayette

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect Design
customer_reviews.text: I love it of what my powder room turns out. From boring to fabulous powder room. Highly recommended! Sophistication is a must? Recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: QueenMom

customer_reviews.title: Great wallpaper
customer_reviews.text: Great looking wallpaper. Love the texture of the the paper. Easy to line up the pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Karlos Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Quality wallpaper
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick easy to work with wallpaper. Not as shiny as pictured & was a bit disappointed. That is the reason for the four stars. I ordered too many rolls & was refunded very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Pups05

customer_reviews.title: I need the vendor to contact me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered twice b/c I needed more wallpaper. In one shipment I received 2 rolls that are different shades. This wallpaper is useless to me. I need a call.
customer_reviews.author: Cari Pinkert

customer_reviews.title: Product quality not consistent!
customer_reviews.text: Out of paper in the middle of my project. Made another order for a new roll. It was fast delivery but the quality just as half as the first order. Wonder if it is same seller since the shipping information from 2 different places!
customer_reviews.author: KhoaPham

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful , good quality! I received the product ( colors and shapes) as advertised . Happy !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Texture
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY love this wallpaper. I installed myself using Roman Pro-543 And it was super easy. It made my bathroom come alive!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Powder Room Makeover
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new powder room. It went from drab to fab. The wallpaper is wonderful...great quality and beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Burton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This wallpaper is absolutely gorgeous! I used it for an accent wall in my bathroom and it's stunning!!
customer_reviews.author: great initially.. then CRAP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty decent unfortunately didn't match with our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Shahab Q.

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. The thick paper makes it easy for no bending while trying to lay wallpaper either 10 feet lengths!
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER REED

customer_reviews.title: Stunning wall
customer_reviews.text: The paper is of high quality and really makes a statement. I was very pleased. It took the installer less than one hour to perfectly hang the paper on an accent wall.
customer_reviews.author: marcus jackson

customer_reviews.title: Looks are deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Not grey and white. Is all the same color just different textures.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I used non-pasted wallpaper. I have to admit this was so much easier. I rolled the paste on wall, section at a time. There was no wait time to put the paper up. This wallpaper is gorgeous! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles N.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice textured. It's my second time to buy wallpaper ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gergeous. Very nice textured. It's my second time to buy wallpaper from this store. I have to say it really impressed me. It matches my furniture very well. Would come AND BUY AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Raman

customer_reviews.title: New look
customer_reviews.text: Love the wall paper went up great , looks wonderful. 😃
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful modern wall paper. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and is pretty thick and high quality. Just be sure you order all you need at one time. I got one roll back in December and 2 more in April and the one from December didn't match, it was faded compared to the new rolls. See pictures below. Fortunately i had enough to do the wall with the matching rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty product, Love it
customer_reviews.text: I used this one in my powder room. Everyone just loves that. Everything just as seller descibed. Nice textured. Gorgeous! Good product, Recommed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern on my bathroom wall. Better than expected!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should be amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Stunning wallpaper. Very thick and elegant. Using it for the back of my glass cabinets. Should be amazing.
customer_reviews.author: trainer_chic

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this wallpaper, the quality of the paper is very good, i will definitely be ordering again for future projects. The pictures online do not do it justice. A little difficult to line up but every wallpaper is.
customer_reviews.author: deborah morley

customer_reviews.title: Modern and yet classic at the same time!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful and well crafted edition to any home!! Looked for some time locally, just could not find exactly what I had in mind. I was pleasantly surprised when I took a chance on wallpaper from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wallpaper, I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the quality. Very elegant wallpaper, not flat, with beautiful texture. The complete effect is just what I want. Thanks a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It came on time and i love it i def recommened this seller and product.
customer_reviews.author: Christina V

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The material is thick and easy to install. For some reason it looks more like a light purple than gray. Reminded me of 1970's style. At least that's how my husband described it.
customer_reviews.author: IRISH

customer_reviews.title: Not Grey
customer_reviews.text: More silver than grey. Not what I was expecting. However, it's high quality looking and I really don't feel like returning it so I'll find somewhere to use it.
customer_reviews.author: KristyB.

customer_reviews.title: VERY disappointed as the design does not look as the one ...
customer_reviews.text: I finally put this wallpaper on my family room. VERY disappointed as the design does not look as the one in the picture. The lines are so small inside the ovals and when you go 2 ft back there is no pattern or design, all you see is just small and big ovals. I wish I had the time to put it sooner so I can replace it with something else. Is not ugly but is not as I expected. Very disappointed. I will follow up with a picture.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Margineanu

customer_reviews.title: i didn't like this wallpaper after i put it up
customer_reviews.text: i didn't like this wallpaper after i put it up...i think because it's silver and the way the pattern is, the lines where the wallpaper was joined was pretty obvious...and i hate that...so i took it down and put a new wallpaper...oh well!
customer_reviews.author: Sleek

product_meta.title: Blooming Wall: Extra-thick Non-woven Modern Leaf Flow Embossed Textured Wallpaper for Livingroom Bedroom, 20.8 In32.8 Ft=57 Sq.ft, Gray&beige
product_meta.description:
Color:Gray/BeigeAbout Us: 

Blooming Wall, lighten the walls. 
Blooming wall has been concentrating in wallpaper field since 2008. We are dedicated to provide all kinds of highest cost-effective wallpaper with elegant design and co-friendly concept. 

Characteristics of Our Non-woven fabric wallpapers: 

water repellent, environmentally-friendly, light weight, fire-retardant, strippable, strong strength and elongation, soft, etc. 

Warm Tips: 

1. It’s not prepasted wallpaper. So it is thicker, stronger, more co-friendly and with more beautiful crafts than the pre-pasted one.We don't provide glue. Need to use wallpaper glue to install. You can buy the glue in the local hardware store. 
2. Due to the different light and monitor display, Color may have tiny difference from the actual product. Pictures are for your reference only. We have tried our best to be the same as the product. 
3. For any buyer who has a large area to cover and has never bought this kind of wallpaper before, to make sure the buyer 100% like our product, it’s a good rule to just buy one roll home at first or make a sample order first. Search: B0177K5AFK on Amazon. You will get the Sample link page. 

Custom Service: 

We love our buyers! We wish you beautiful life and happy shopping in BloomingWall USA Store. If you meet any problem or have any suggestions, please contact us in first time. We will follow up your messages in less than 6 hours. We will try our best to resolve your problem.
feature_bullets: 🌸【Size】Very Cost Effective. Price for One large Double Roll. Each Roll is 20.8 Inches Wide by 11 Yard Long, Covering 57 Square ft. Pattern repeat: 20.8 inch(53 cm)
💖【Feature】Unprepasted,Spongeable, Strippable.Wallpaper Glue can be Bought in your Local Hardware Store.
💖【Warm Tips】Easy to apply, applying instruction is included in each roll. Please buy accurate rolls at one time to avoid slim color difference.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars121 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
